    APPEND_ITEM STATUS 32 UINT "The deserialization error"
        STATE ERR_BUFFER_TOO_SMALL 0
        STATE ERR_BUFFER_FORMAT 1
        STATE ERR_SIZE_MISMATCH 2
        STATE ERR_TYPE_MISMATCH 3
        STATE ERR_UNEXP_STAT 4
